title: Apex Legends: Conduit Free Unlock Bundle Giveaway
description: Grab the Conduit Free Unlock Bundle and drop straight into Apex Legends! This bundle includes Conduit Unlocked and "Aqua Flow" Flatline Epic Skin! Please note the base game Apex Legends is required to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the content to your library (base game required).

title: CYGNI: All Guns Blazing (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Ready to blast off into some intergalactic chaos? Claim CYGNI: All Guns Blazing for free on Epic Games Store! CYGNI: All Guns Blazing is a fast paced shoot-em up with eye-popping visuals and lots of enemies!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: DNF Duel (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Grab a free copy of DNF Duel via Epic Games Store and jump into this extreme fighting game! DNF Duel is a 2.5D action fighting game with 16 charming character and a story mode!
instructions:
1. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
2. Click the "GET" button to add the game to your library.

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.

title: Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key Giveaway
description: Score Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key and unlock lots of in-game items for Fangs including 14 Heroes, 1,000 Realm Gold, Season Zero Battle Pass and much more!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key (Please note the key must be redeemed in-game).
